result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for implementing an HTTP client with methods for making GET and POST requests, handling responses and errors.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating HTTP client functionality with clear separation of concerns for request handling and error processing.

httpclient/httpclient.go.purpose: This file implements an HTTP client with methods for GET and POST requests, handling responses and errors.
side_effects: Logs HTTP request details and durations
risks: Potential for unhandled errors during HTTP requests
Improper handling of response bodies may lead to resource leaks
